description:
Did you know that effective asset management practices pose challenges for almost half of small businesses? According to the latest research, 43% of businesses either manually report their inventory or in a few cases, do not record assets in any manner. However, asset management is not immune to the disruptive pressure of artificial intelligence (AI)... Read more »

The post Using AI technologies for future asset management appeared first on AI News.
title: Using AI technologies for future asset management
